Articles.Content:
so how about this?

Smaa

Even better since someone already did it : SMAA Unity

But you will have to wait for KSP 1.1

Edited November 30, 2015 by sarbian

I believe Dragon Age Inquisition uses it. It isn't as good as multisampling AA and has some problems when, for exampling, standing 100 or so meters in front of stairs, but it has only minor perfomance impact.
Would be awesome to have it, as well as some other postprocessing effects. KSP isn't all about graphics, I know, but having 2005-style graphics isn't good either.
There is a working smaa injector: http://mrhaandi.blogspot.be/p/injectsmaa.html

1 hour ago, sashan said:

I believe Dragon Age Inquisition uses it. It isn't as good as multisampling AA and has some problems when, for exampling, standing 100 or so meters in front of stairs, but it has only minor perfomance impact.
Would be awesome to have it, as well as some other postprocessing effects. KSP isn't all about graphics, I know, but having 2005-style graphics isn't good either.

In the last dev update they said that KSP is moving to physical based rendering. It should improve the graphics a bit too.
